scripts.bundle: npm run build && rm -rf bundle && pkg package.json --out-path bundle --targets latest-macos-x64,latest-win-x64,latest-linux-x64 && mv bundle/main-linux bundle/tm-obs-switcher-linux && mv bundle/main-macos bundle/tm-obs-switcher-macos && mv bundle/main-win.exe bundle/tm-obs-switcher-win.exe
scripts.rb: npm run build && npm run bundle && ./bundle/main-macos
